com.youama.nexus.core.system

Class SystemUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.youama.nexus.core.system.SystemUtil

  • public final class SystemUtil
extends Object
    This static class is the main class of the Nexus engine. The SystemUtil class provides access to other classes and objects what are provide global, resource and system/configuration specified features.
    Since:
    2015.08.09.
    Author:
    David Belicza - 87.bdavid@gmail.com

    • Method Detail

      • initiateSystem

        public static void initiateSystem()
        Initiate the Nexus Engine. This method has to be called from outside because of the application context and other global settings and hooks. If a module calls this method that downgrades the access to the module's local level instead application level.

      • initiateSystem

        public static void initiateSystem(boolean production,
                  String database)

      • clearCache

        public static void clearCache()

      • testSystem

        public static void testSystem()
        This method does not trigger any unit or story tests, it is for checking the current system/device before initiateSystem boots the engine.

      • getBaseDirectory

        public static String getBaseDirectory()

      • getService

        public static Object getService(Class classType)
        It retrieves the entity's service implementation by the service class name.
        Parameters:
        classType - Any class type what is a service class. Service classes should be defined as a Bean.
        Returns:
        It is the service implementation. Return type is an Object what can be cast to any service class.
